column1: Sami ur izmir ara ad iεawed tansa-ines.
Nniɣ-as i Tom anda bɣiɣ ad ruḥeγ.
Imaziɣen d aɣref i d-yeǧǧan isem-is deg umezruy.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ad k-qerḥeɣ. Bɣiɣ ad k-ɛawneɣ.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ad kem-qerḥeɣ. Bɣiɣ ad kem-ɛawneɣ.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ad ken-qerḥeɣ. Bɣiɣ ad ken-ɛawneɣ.
Ur bɣiɣ ara ad kent-qerḥeɣ. Bɣiɣ ad kent-ɛawneɣ.
Ibeddel Darwin amek i nettwali amaḍal.
Ur ḥemmleɣ ara aẓawan n raï.
Cannibal Corpse d agraw amarikani n death metal.
Cannibal Corpse ttarbaεt tamarikanit n death metal.
Andaz Uzzal tarbaεt taqbaylit n metal.
Aɛli Ɛemran d acennay aqbayli n rock.
Taɣiwant n At Dwala tuzga-d deg Tizi Uzzu.
Ilul Leonardo Fibonacci deg temdint n Pise.
Yemmut Kurt Cobain ass n 5 yeberir 1994 deg Seattle.
Mḥemmed Isyaxem d anaẓur aqbayli mucaεen.
Yezmer Chuck Norris ad yettekki ɣef F13.
Ilul Yasuε deg 1940 uqbel Chuck Norris.
Ur yezmir ara ad yewt snitra.
Ilul Chuck Norris deg uxxam i yebna.
James Allison akked Tasuku Honjo rebḥen arraz Nobel n tujjya.
Yerbeḥ Tom arraz Nobel n tfizikt.
Iḥemmel Tom ad yettwali Mary tceṭṭeḥ.
Yesbedd Anton Szandor Lavey taglisya n cciṭan.
Yekcem Tom ɣer teglisya n cciṭan.
Yessekcem Tom Mary ɣer taglisya n cciṭan.
Tom akked Mary kecmen ɣer taglisya n cciṭan.
